category: Regulations on the establishment and operation of the Advisory Committee/Article 3 (Composition)
contents: Article 3 (Composition) ① The committee shall be composed of the following members. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 1. 31. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 3 vice-chairmen *3. 11 to 15 members (including the chairman and vice-chairman) ② The committee shall have one secretary, who is appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the *Chairman) from among the employees of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the *Sports Council). Newly established 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5.
